EmailTemplate.name: 03-14-23 CP Global Channel SKO Thank You Comm.03-14-23 CP Global Channel SKO Tha
EmailTemplate.subject: Global Channel Sales Kickoff 2023: Replay & survey now available
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Global Channel Sales Kickoff 2023: Replay & survey now available Dear Valued Channel Partners, Thank you to everyone who attended our Global Channel Sales Kickoff 2023 webinar last Thursday, March 9. It was great to come together with our channel partners from around the world and align on strategy, outline priorities for the upcoming year and celebrate our shared success. - Please take a few minutes to complete our post-webinar survey <[[https://forms.office.com/Pages/ResponsePage.aspx?id=9_FNrh5hT0SJfvlk4SBRcY2fbifc0Z1GnZinukAJybxUN1BSMDc1NTVKQUtYMUkxMzZTMzhMSFowVy4u]]> by this Friday, March 17. Your feedback will help us improve our future events. - For anyone unable to attend the webinar in real time, a replay is now available <[[https://ncr.seismic.com/Link/Content/DCcmT2RBHdhfG8hH3BpBBFG24JDj]]>. We hope you’ll find the content educational and beneficial in driving your business today and planning for tomorrow. - If you have any questions or need additional information, please reach out to your NCR channel account manager or email ChannelSales.NCR@ncr.com. We appreciate your continued commitment and collaboration. We look forward to sharing more details in industry-focused follow-up meetings, so we can transform, connect and run our mutual customers’ technology platforms. Best regards, The NCR Partner Network Team <[[https://www.facebook.com/ncrcorp/?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://twitter.com/NCRCorporation?${url-parameter}]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/ncrcorporation/?${url-parameter}"> © 2019 NCR Corporation All rights reserved. 864 Spring St NW, Atlanta, GA 30308 https://www.ncr.com/ <[[https://www.ncr.com/?${url-parameter}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]>
